item.title: Mail with postfix and ldap
item.description: Yes, it’s possible. I did it for the pragyan.org server. The setup we used was : /var/mail/virtual/%u: the inboxes of different users, /var/mail/virtual/PragyanMail/%u/%f: the different folders in mailboxes of different users. It’s much easily setup than one thinks initially. HOW?? Here’s how: But, as with anything else, basics first SMTP server : Simple Mail Transfer Protocol : The server which sends and receives mails. Postfix (or smtp).
